control.visible: Skin.Hassetting(noflow) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart)) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting) + !SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://movies/sets) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))
control.label: [CR][CR][CR][CR][CR] $INFO[ListItem.Title]

control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart)) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(poster)) + !SubString(ListItem(0).Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.Hassetting(Fakedischandwriting) + Skin.Hassetting(fakehanddisccolor)

Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(discart)) + !IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(poster)) + !SubString(ListItem(0).Path,videodb://movies/sets) + Container.Content(movies) + Skin.Hassetting(Fakedischandwriting) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(clearlogo))
control.label: [CR][CR][CR][CR][CR] $INFO[ListItem.Label]

animation.condition: Control.IsVisible(1970) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies)

Control.IsVisible(1970) + Skin.HasSetting(usecases) + Skin.HasSetting(OpenCase) + [!IsEmpty(Container.ListItem.Art(discart)) | !IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(Set.Movie.1.Art(discart))) | Skin.HasSetting(Fakedischandwriting)| Skin.Hassetting(fakediscart)] + !Skin.HasSetting(clearcases) + Container.Content(movies)
